effect.en: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
effect.fr: Cherchez dans votre deck une carte Pokémon de base et placez-la sur votre Banc. Mélangez ensuite votre deck.

description.en: The direction of its belly spiral differs by area. The equator is thought to have an effect on this.
